name: Stephen Gary
description: I am looking for a real relationship with a Loving, Caring, Faithful, Genuine, Honest, Peaceful and Matured Minded God fearing woman, a woman who is down to earth,who knows how to hold down a good conversation and that kind of woman I am looking for must have the sense of Humor, Intelligent, Brave, Sweet in words and has actions to show me, confident and who knows how to always lay-bare his feelings whenever anything happens along the way.
